summary.para: Sets the sample for the media stream source.

param.name: value
param.para: The sample for the media stream source.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Represents a request for a sample from a MediaStreamSource.

remarks.para: MFMediaStreamSourceSampleRequest is implemented by the Windows.Media.Core.MediaStreamSourceSampleRequest runtime class.
